Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Leviathan Drive, east of the Knightly Order of the White Cross.
Room.LongDescription: Directly to the west is a superb apple orchid, with some of the most beautiful trees you have ever seen. Each tree is loaded with large and shiny apples. In the distance to the southeast, across the orchid, you can see the towers of the Ashton Falls Resort, where the rich and famous stay when they are visiting Oceancrest.
